mapper.select: select * from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) order by name,id DESC

select name,sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime) as rate,date from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) group by date,name

select sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime) as rate,date from Equipmentstatus where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Equipmentstatus) group by date
select * from Equipmentstatus where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} order by name,id DESC
select name,sum(failureTime) as failureTime,sum(officeTime) as officeTime,sum(failureTime)/sum(officeTime) as rate from Equipmentstatus where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} group by name
select sum(Equipmentstatus.failureTime)/sum(Equipmentstatus.officeTime) as rate from Equipmentstatus where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}

select Equipmentstatus.name as name,sum(Equipmentstatus.failureTime)/sum(Equipmentstatus.officeTime) as rate,month(Equipmentstatus.date) as month from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = #{date} and YEAR(Aim.date)=#{date} and Equipmentstatus.name=#{name} GROUP BY MONTH ( Equipmentstatus.date ),Aim.equipment ,Equipmentstatus.name

select Equipmentstatus.name as name,Aim.equipment as indicators,sum(Equipmentstatus.failureTime)/sum(Equipmentstatus.officeTime) as yearRate from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = #{date} and YEAR(Aim.date)=#{date} and Equipmentstatus.name =#{name} GROUP BY Aim.equipment ,Equipmentstatus.name

select sum(Equipmentstatus.failureTime)/sum(Equipmentstatus.officeTime) as rate,month(Equipmentstatus.date) as month from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = #{date} and YEAR(Aim.date)=#{date} GROUP BY MONTH ( Equipmentstatus.date ),Aim.equipment

select Aim.equipment as indicators,sum(Equipmentstatus.failureTime)/sum(Equipmentstatus.officeTime) as yearRate from Equipmentstatus,Aim WHERE YEAR ( Equipmentstatus.date ) = '2020' and YEAR(Aim.date)='2020' GROUP BY Aim.equipment
